name: bootstrap-gh-pages
description: Bootstrap custom build without scripts and icons

scripts.build: lessc --autoprefix="Android 2.3, Android >= 4, Chrome >= 20, Firefox >= 24, Explorer >= 8, iOS >= 6, Opera >= 12, Safari >= 6" index.less > index.css

author: Andrey Polischuk <andre.polischuk@gmail.com>
